title: Prescriptive Modeling Makes Causal Bets – Whether You Know it or Not!
content:
An explanation of the causal assumption implicit in prescriptive modeling and how to satisfy it.
The post Prescriptive Modeling Makes Causal Bets – Whether You Know it or Not! appeared first on Towards Data Science.
author: Jarom Hulet
